question: 構成
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>set up</kanji> something so that it <kanji>become</kanji>s a certain way, that's the <vocabulary>organization</vocabulary> of this thing. That's its <vocabulary>structure</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>composition</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
